summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Vassar Avenue, from East 60th Street to East 65th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with property owners' petition, being City Comptroller's File No. 182518, to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
